function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limitations and deficiencies of buildings in urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Improving building infrastructure and facilities to minimize disease transmission","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purification technology","People":"Residents, workers, visitors in urban areas","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building owners"},{"Description":"Potential temporary changes to the built environment","Impact":"Uncertainty and instability in the urban environment","Mitigation":"Implementing flexible and adaptable design solutions","Technologies":"Modular building components, smart infrastructure systems","People":"Urban planners, architects, building developers","Owner":"City governments, private developers"},{"Description":"Lack of sustainability in the built environment","Impact":"Increased environmental impact and resource consumption","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable design and construction practices","Technologies":"Green building materials, energy-efficient systems","People":"Local communities, environmental advocates","Owner":"Architects, construction companies"}]}
